sentences.en: Colonel Slade: This is such a crock of shit!
sentences.cn: 史雷德中校: 这场听证会简直是胡闹(一团狗屎)!

sentences.en: Lincoln liked Slade, often talked with him, asking his opinion about different matters.
sentences.cn: 林肯喜欢他, 常常和他谈话并就各种问题征求他的意见.

sentences.en: Of course it's only gossip about major slade and his going on.
sentences.cn: 当然这只是关于斯莱德少校及其行为的流言蜚语.

sentences.en: Of course it's only gossip about Major Slade and his goings - on.
sentences.cn: 当然这只是关于斯莱德少校及其行为的流盲蜚语.

sentences.en: Please watch your language, Mr. Slade. You are in the Baird school, not a barracks.
sentences.cn: (舍监)请注意你的措辞, 史雷德先生! 这里是学校, 不是军营.

sentences.en: Schoolmaster: Please watch your language, Mr. Slade. You are in the Baird school, not a barracks.
sentences.cn: 校长: 请注意你的措辞, 史雷德先生! 你身在贝尔学校, 而不是军营.

sentences.en: Slade Any minute? Some people minute. What are you doing now?
sentences.cn: 一霎霎?一霎霎能干多少是事儿咧? 跟这儿等人有啥意思? 走,跟哥吃泡馍且.

sentences.en: Slade: No, I’m just getting warmed up.
sentences.cn: 斯莱德：没有，我这才刚刚热身。

sentences.en: Sue is having a lesson with her new teacher, Mr Slade.
sentences.cn: 苏正在上她的新老师斯莱德先生的课.

sentences.en: There are also very good teachers at the Slade School.
sentences.cn: 另外就是Slade学校也有很多不错的老师.

trans.tran_cn: [人名] [南方英格兰人姓氏] 斯莱德地貌名称，或住所名称，来源于古英语，含义是“小河谷”(small valley)，[地名] [美国] 斯莱德
